entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as having a steady expression despite the situation. His red eyes seem to burn in the firelight.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is described as disheveled and bloody but otherwise unharmed. She is sitting closest to Voldemort.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: The Elder Wand is mentioned as being drawn by Voldemort between his long fingers.

relationships.description: Voldemort silences Bellatrix with a hand gesture, and she does not speak another word.
Voldemort draws the Elder Wand between his long fingers.
